CustomField.formula: "Summit Matching Rule 1:" + BR() + " First 3 chars of First Name/Pref first name, Last Name, Birthdate => Last Name, Email;"+ BR() + " - - - - - - - - - - - " + BR() + "Summit Matching Rule 2:" + BR() + " Last Name/Previous last name, Class year, First name, Phone => Last Name, Class Year, First 3 chars of First name" + BR() + " - - - - - - - - - - - " + BR() + "Use Salesforce Duplicate Rule:" + BR() + " Uses a Salesforce Duplicate Rule to create a custom matching formula"
CustomField.label: Contact Matching Rule Description
